1: ק֥וּמִי <sup>6965 </sup> <n>Arise</n> א֖וֹרִי <sup>215 </sup> <n>shine</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בָ֣א <sup>935 </sup> <n>is come</n> אוֹרֵ֑ךְ <sup>216 </sup> <n>for thy light</n> וּכְב֥וֹד <sup>3519 </sup> <n>and the glory</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> עָלַ֥יִךְ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> זָרָֽח׃ <sup>2224 </sup> <n>is risen</n>
2: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> הִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> הַחֹ֙שֶׁךְ֙ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>For behold the darkness</n> יְכַסֶּה־ <sup>3680 </sup> <n>shall cover</n> אֶ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the earth</n> וַעֲרָפֶ֖ל <sup>6205 </sup> <n>and gross darkness</n> לְאֻמִּ֑ים <sup>3816 </sup> <n>the people</n> וְעָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> יִזְרַ֣ח <sup>2224 </sup> <n>shall arise</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>but the LORD</n> וּכְבוֹד֖וֹ <sup>3519 </sup> <n>upon thee and his glory</n> עָלַ֥יִךְ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> יֵרָאֶֽה׃ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>shall be seen</n>
3: וְהָלְכ֥וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>shall come</n> גוֹיִ֖ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>And the Gentiles</n> לְאוֹרֵ֑ךְ <sup>216 </sup> <n>to thy light</n> וּמְלָכִ֖ים <sup>4428 </sup> <n>and kings</n> לְנֹ֥גַהּ <sup>5051 </sup> <n>to the brightness</n> זַרְחֵֽךְ׃ <sup>2225 </sup> <n>of thy rising</n>
4: שְׂאִֽי־ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>Lift up</n> סָבִ֤יב <sup>5439 </sup> <n>round about</n> עֵינַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>thine eyes</n> וּרְאִ֔י <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and see</n> כֻּלָּ֖ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> נִקְבְּצ֣וּ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>all they gather themselves together</n> בָֽאוּ־ <sup>935 </sup> <n>they come</n> לָ֑ךְ בָּנַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>to thee thy sons</n> מֵרָח֣וֹק <sup>7350 </sup> <n>from far</n> יָבֹ֔אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> וּבְנֹתַ֖יִךְ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and thy daughters</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> צַ֥ד <sup>6654 </sup> <n>at [thy] side</n> תֵּאָמַֽנָה׃ <sup>539 </sup> <n>shall be nursed</n>
5: אָ֤ז <sup>227 </sup> <n>Then</n> תִּרְאִי֙ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>will see</n> וְנָהַ֔רְתְּ <sup>5102 </sup> <n>and flow together</n> וּפָחַ֥ד <sup>6342 </sup> <n>shall fear</n> וְרָחַ֖ב <sup>7337 </sup> <n>and be enlarged</n> לְבָבֵ֑ךְ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>and thine heart</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> יֵהָפֵ֤ךְ <sup>2015 </sup> <n>shall be converted</n> עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> הֲמ֣וֹן <sup>1995 </sup> <n>because the abundance</n> יָ֔ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>of the sea</n> חֵ֥יל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>unto thee the forces</n> גּוֹיִ֖ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the Gentiles</n> יָבֹ֥אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> לָֽךְ׃
6: שִֽׁפְעַ֨ת <sup>8229 </sup> <n>The multitude</n> גְּמַלִּ֜ים <sup>1581 </sup> <n>of camels</n> תְּכַסֵּ֗ךְ <sup>3680 </sup> <n>shall cover</n> בִּכְרֵ֤י <sup>1070 </sup> <n>thee the dromedaries</n> מִדְיָן֙ <sup>4080 </sup> <n>of Midian</n> וְעֵיפָ֔ה <sup>5891 </sup> <n>and Ephah</n> כֻּלָּ֖ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> מִשְּׁבָ֣א <sup>7614 </sup> <n>all they from Sheba</n> יָבֹ֑אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> זָהָ֤ב <sup>2091 </sup> <n>gold</n> וּלְבוֹנָה֙ <sup>3828 </sup> <n>and incense</n> יִשָּׂ֔אוּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>they shall bring</n> וּתְהִלֹּ֥ת <sup>8416 </sup> <n>the praises</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> יְבַשֵּֽׂרוּ׃ <sup>1319 </sup> <n>and they shall shew forth</n>
7: כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> צֹ֤אן <sup>6629 </sup> <n>All the flocks</n> קֵדָר֙ <sup>6938 </sup> <n>of Kedar</n> יִקָּ֣בְצוּ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>shall be gathered together</n> לָ֔ךְ אֵילֵ֥י <sup>352 </sup> <n>unto thee the rams</n> נְבָי֖וֹת <sup>5032 </sup> <n>of Nebaioth</n> יְשָׁרְת֑וּנֶךְ <sup>8334 </sup> <n>shall minister</n> יַעֲל֤וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>unto thee they shall come up</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>with</n> רָצוֹן֙ <sup>7522 </sup> <n>with acceptance</n> מִזְבְּחִ֔י <sup>4196 </sup> <n>on mine altar</n> וּבֵ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>the house</n> תִּפְאַרְתִּ֖י <sup>8597 </sup> <n>of my glory</n> אֲפָאֵֽר׃ <sup>6286 </sup> <n>and I will glorify</n>
8: מִי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> אֵ֖לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>are these</n> כָּעָ֣ב <sup>5645 </sup> <n>as a cloud</n> תְּעוּפֶ֑ינָה <sup>5774 </sup> <n>Who [are] these [that] fly</n> וְכַיּוֹנִ֖ים <sup>3123 </sup> <n>and as the doves</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אֲרֻבֹּתֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>699 </sup> <n>chimney</n>
9: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Surely</n> לִ֣י ׀ אִיִּ֣ים <sup>339 </sup> <n>Surely the isles</n> יְקַוּ֗וּ <sup>6960 </sup> <n>shall wait</n> וָאֳנִיּ֤וֹת <sup>591 </sup> <n>for me and the ships</n> תַּרְשִׁישׁ֙ <sup>8659 </sup> <n>of Tarshish</n> בָּרִ֣אשֹׁנָ֔ה <sup>7223 </sup> <n>first</n> לְהָבִ֤יא <sup>935 </sup> <n>to bring</n> בָנַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>thy sons</n> מֵֽרָח֔וֹק <sup>7350 </sup> <n>from far</n> כַּסְפָּ֥ם <sup>3701 </sup> <n>their silver</n> וּזְהָבָ֖ם <sup>2091 </sup> <n>and their gold</n> אִתָּ֑ם <sup>854 </sup> <n>For</n> לְשֵׁם֙ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>with them unto the name</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֱלֹהַ֔יִךְ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> וְלִקְד֥וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>and to the Holy One</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> פֵאֲרָֽךְ׃ <sup>6286 </sup> <n>because he hath glorified</n>
10: וּבָנ֤וּ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>shall build up</n> בְנֵֽי־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>And the sons</n> נֵכָר֙ <sup>5236 </sup> <n>of strangers</n> חֹמֹתַ֔יִךְ <sup>2346 </sup> <n>thy walls</n> וּמַלְכֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>4428 </sup> <n>and their kings</n> יְשָׁרְת֑וּנֶךְ <sup>8334 </sup> <n>shall minister</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>in</n> בְקִצְפִּי֙ <sup>7110 </sup> <n>unto thee for in my wrath</n> הִכִּיתִ֔יךְ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>I smote</n> וּבִרְצוֹנִ֖י <sup>7522 </sup> <n>thee but in my favour</n> רִֽחַמְתִּֽיךְ׃ <sup>7355 </sup> <n>have I had mercy</n>
11: וּפִתְּח֨וּ <sup>6605 </sup> <n>shall be open</n> שְׁעָרַ֧יִךְ <sup>8179 </sup> <n>Therefore thy gates</n> תָּמִ֛יד <sup>8548 </sup> <n>continually</n> יוֹמָ֥ם <sup>3119 </sup> <n>day</n> וָלַ֖יְלָה <sup>3915 </sup> <n>nor night</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִסָּגֵ֑רוּ <sup>5462 </sup> <n>they shall not be shut</n> לְהָבִ֤יא <sup>935 </sup> <n>that [men] may bring</n> אֵלַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to you</n> חֵ֣יל <sup>2428 </sup> <n>unto thee the forces</n> גּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the Gentiles</n> וּמַלְכֵיהֶ֖ם <sup>4428 </sup> <n>and [that] their kings</n> נְהוּגִֽים׃ <sup>5090 </sup> <n>[may be] brought</n>
12: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> הַגּ֧וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>For the nation</n> וְהַמַּמְלָכָ֛ה <sup>4467 </sup> <n>and kingdom</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> יַעַבְד֖וּךְ <sup>5647 </sup> <n>that will not serve</n> יֹאבֵ֑דוּ <sup>6 </sup> <n>thee shall perish</n> וְהַגּוֹיִ֖ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>yea [those] nations</n> חָרֹ֥ב <sup>2717 </sup> <n>shall be utterly</n> יֶחֱרָֽבוּ׃ <sup>2717 </sup> <n>wasted</n>
13: כְּב֤וֹד <sup>3519 </sup> <n>The glory</n> הַלְּבָנוֹן֙ <sup>3844 </sup> <n>of Lebanon</n> אֵלַ֣יִךְ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> יָב֔וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall come</n> בְּר֛וֹשׁ <sup>1265 </sup> <n>unto thee the fir tree</n> תִּדְהָ֥ר <sup>8410 </sup> <n>the pine tree</n> וּתְאַשּׁ֖וּר <sup>8391 </sup> <n>and the box</n> יַחְדָּ֑ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> לְפָאֵר֙ <sup>6286 </sup> <n>to beautify</n> מְק֣וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>the place</n> מִקְדָּשִׁ֔י <sup>4720 </sup> <n>of my sanctuary</n> וּמְק֥וֹם <sup>4725 </sup> <n>and I will make the place</n> רַגְלַ֖י <sup>7272 </sup> <n>of my feet</n> אֲכַבֵּֽד׃ <sup>3513 </sup> <n>glorious</n>
14: וְהָלְכ֨וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>thee shall come</n> אֵלַ֤יִךְ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> שְׁח֙וֹחַ֙ <sup>7817 </sup> <n>bending</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>The sons</n> מְעַנַּ֔יִךְ <sup>6031 </sup> <n>also of them that afflicted</n> וְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲו֛וּ <sup>7812 </sup> <n>thee shall bow themselves down</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>at</n> כַּפּ֥וֹת <sup>3709 </sup> <n>at the soles</n> רַגְלַ֖יִךְ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>of thy feet</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> מְנַֽאֲצָ֑יִךְ <sup>5006 </sup> <n>unto thee and all they that despised</n> וְקָ֤רְאוּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and they shall call</n> לָךְ֙ עִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>thee The city</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> צִיּ֖וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>The Zion</n> קְד֥וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>of the Holy One</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
15: תַּ֧חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Whereas</n> הֱיוֹתֵ֛ךְ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have been</n> עֲזוּבָ֥ה <sup>5805 </sup> <n>forsaking</n> וּשְׂנוּאָ֖ה <sup>8130 </sup> <n>and hated</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> עוֹבֵ֑ר <sup>5674 </sup> <n>so that no man went through</n> וְשַׂמְתִּיךְ֙ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>[thee] I will make</n> לִגְא֣וֹן <sup>1347 </sup> <n>excellency</n> עוֹלָ֔ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>thee an eternal</n> מְשׂ֖וֹשׂ <sup>4885 </sup> <n>a joy</n> דּ֥וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>of many</n> וָדֽוֹר׃ <sup>1755 </sup> <n>generations</n>
16: וְיָנַקְתְּ֙ <sup>3243 </sup> <n>Thou shalt also suck</n> חֲלֵ֣ב <sup>2461 </sup> <n>the milk</n> גּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the Gentiles</n> וְשֹׁ֥ד <sup>7699 </sup> <n>the breast</n> מְלָכִ֖ים <sup>4428 </sup> <n>of kings</n> תִּינָ֑קִי <sup>3243 </sup> <n>and shalt suck</n> וְיָדַ֗עַתְּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and thou shalt know</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֤י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that I the LORD</n> מֽוֹשִׁיעֵ֔ךְ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>[am] thy Saviour</n> וְגֹאֲלֵ֖ךְ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>and thy Redeemer</n> אֲבִ֥יר <sup>46 </sup> <n>the mighty One</n> יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n>
17: תַּ֣חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Instead</n> הַנְּחֹ֜שֶׁת <sup>5178 </sup> <n>For brass</n> אָבִ֣יא <sup>935 </sup> <n>I will bring</n> זָהָ֗ב <sup>2091 </sup> <n>gold</n> וְתַ֤חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>and instead</n> הַבַּרְזֶל֙ <sup>1270 </sup> <n>and for iron</n> אָ֣בִיא <sup>935 </sup> <n>I will bring</n> כֶ֔סֶף <sup>3701 </sup> <n>silver</n> וְתַ֤חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>and instead</n> הָֽעֵצִים֙ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>and for wood</n> נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <sup>5178 </sup> <n>brass</n> וְתַ֥חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>and instead</n> הָאֲבָנִ֖ים <sup>68 </sup> <n>and for stones</n> בַּרְזֶ֑ל <sup>1270 </sup> <n>iron</n> וְשַׂמְתִּ֤י <sup>7760 </sup> <n>I will also make</n> פְקֻדָּתֵךְ֙ <sup>6486 </sup> <n>thy officers</n> שָׁל֔וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>peace</n> וְנֹגְשַׂ֖יִךְ <sup>5065 </sup> <n>and thine exactors</n> צְדָקָֽה׃ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>righteousness</n>
18: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יִשָּׁמַ֨ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>shall no more be heard</n> ע֤וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> חָמָס֙ <sup>2555 </sup> <n>Violence</n> בְּאַרְצֵ֔ךְ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in thy land</n> שֹׁ֥ד <sup>7701 </sup> <n>wasting</n> וָשֶׁ֖בֶר <sup>7667 </sup> <n>nor destruction</n> בִּגְבוּלָ֑יִךְ <sup>1366 </sup> <n>within thy borders</n> וְקָרָ֤את <sup>7121 </sup> <n>but thou shalt call</n> יְשׁוּעָה֙ <sup>3444 </sup> <n>Salvation</n> חוֹמֹתַ֔יִךְ <sup>2346 </sup> <n>thy walls</n> וּשְׁעָרַ֖יִךְ <sup>8179 </sup> <n>and thy gates</n> תְּהִלָּֽה׃ <sup>8416 </sup> <n>Praise</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יִֽהְיֶה־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n>
19: לָּ֨ךְ ע֤וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>The sun</n> לְא֣וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>shall be no more thy light</n> יוֹמָ֔ם <sup>3119 </sup> <n>by day</n> וּלְנֹ֕גַהּ <sup>5051 </sup> <n>neither for brightness</n> הַיָּרֵ֖חַ <sup>3394 </sup> <n>shall the moon</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>No</n> יָאִ֣יר <sup>215 </sup> <n>light</n> לָ֑ךְ וְהָיָה־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have</n> לָ֤ךְ יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto thee but the LORD</n> לְא֣וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>give light</n> עוֹלָ֔ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>shall be unto thee an everlasting</n> וֵאלֹהַ֖יִךְ <sup>430 </sup> <n>and thy God</n> לְתִפְאַרְתֵּֽךְ׃ <sup>8597 </sup> <n>thy glory</n>
20: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will no</n> יָב֥וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>shall no more go down</n> עוֹד֙ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>longer</n> שִׁמְשֵׁ֔ךְ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>Thy sun</n> וִירֵחֵ֖ךְ <sup>3391 </sup> <n>neither shall thy moon</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יֵאָסֵ֑ף <sup>622 </sup> <n>withdraw</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>itself for the LORD</n> יִֽהְיֶה־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will have</n> לָּךְ֙ לְא֣וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>light</n> עוֹלָ֔ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>shall be thine everlasting</n> וְשָׁלְמ֖וּ <sup>7999 </sup> <n>shall be ended</n> יְמֵ֥י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>and the days</n> אֶבְלֵֽךְ׃ <sup>60 </sup> <n>of thy mourning</n>
21: וְעַמֵּךְ֙ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>Thy people</n> כֻּלָּ֣ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> צַדִּיקִ֔ים <sup>6662 </sup> <n>also [shall be] all righteous</n> לְעוֹלָ֖ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for ever</n> יִ֣ירְשׁוּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>they shall inherit</n> אָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> נֵ֧צֶר <sup>5342 </sup> <n>the branch</n> [מַטָּעֹו כ] (מַטָּעַ֛י <sup>4302 </sup> <n>garden</n> ק) מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>the work</n> יָדַ֖י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of my hands</n> לְהִתְפָּאֵֽר׃ <sup>6286 </sup> <n>that I may be glorified</n>
22: הַקָּטֹן֙ <sup>6996 </sup> <n>A little one</n> יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will become</n> לָאֶ֔לֶף <sup>505 </sup> <n>shall become a thousand</n> וְהַצָּעִ֖יר <sup>6810 </sup> <n>and a small one</n> לְג֣וֹי <sup>1471 </sup> <n>nation</n> עָצ֑וּם <sup>6099 </sup> <n>a strong</n> אֲנִ֥י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>I the LORD</n> בְּעִתָּ֥הּ <sup>6256 </sup> <n>it in his time</n> אֲחִישֶֽׁנָּה׃ <sup>2363 </sup> <n>will hasten</n> ס
